text: The Motorcycle Diaries () is a 2004 biopic about the journey and written memoir of the 23-year-old Ernesto Guevara, who would become known as the notorious Marxist guerrilla leader and revolutionary leader Che Guevara. It stars Gael García Bernal, Rodrigo de la Serna, Mercedes Morán, Jean Pierre Noher and was distributed by Focus Features. It was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 2005. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:2000s road movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:Argentine biographical movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Chilean movies Category:German biographical movies Category:German drama movies Category:Peruvian movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Walter Salles Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in Argentina Category:Movies set in Chile Category:Movies set in Peru Category:Movies set in Venezuela
title: The Motorcycle Diaries (movie)
